dct_description_sm: dressée pour l'intelligence de l'histoire sainte par le Sr. Brion.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Milles hébraiques", "Milles romains", "Lieues d'une heure".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Decorative title cartouche with illustrations of a well, men, and trees.
